issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description: The sample Alloy tabs app crashes immediately when I run it on my phone with debugging enabled.  With debugging off it works fine.
fields.summary: Alloy app crashes on Android phone when debugging is enabled.

comments.body:
Do you mean you have USB debugging enabled on the device, or do you mean that you are attempting to use the debugger in TiStudio and that is causing the error? 

Also, does this happen when you build a non-alloy app? This will help determine whether the problem is with alloy or with the Titanium build process itself.
Can't reproduce on any android device I have. Will revisit if additional information is provided on how this error can be manifested.
